name.en: One by One We Walk, Frosty Forest Frolicking, Treading in the Tracks
name.ja: <ruby>雪<rt>ゆき</rt></ruby><ruby>沓<rt>ぐつ</rt></ruby>の <ruby>跡<rt>あと</rt></ruby><ruby>追<rt>お</rt></ruby>うひとつ またひとつ
name.ja_romaji: Yukigutsu no Ato Ou Hitotsu Mata Hitotsu

text.en: If a card(s) other than "One by One We Walk, Frosty Forest Frolicking, Treading in the Tracks" is sent to the GY: Banish up to 5 cards from your GY face-down, then, if you have 7 or more face-down banished cards, your opponent banishes as many cards from their GY as possible face-down (max. 5).
